long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Boost Your Productivity: Stay organized and focused with the Productivity Assistant Chrome extension. Easily manage your tasks in a spreadsheet-style layout, track their status, and enjoy persistent data storage for seamless use across sessions. Effortlessly create, update, and delete tasks, while the intuitive interface keeps you on top of your goals.Take control of your productivity today!"
